Trade/Device Name(s): Thermo Scientific CEDIA Amphetamine OFT Assay
Submitter Information: Thermo Fisher Scientific, Clinical Diagnostic Division
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Thermo Scientific CEDIA Amphetamine OFT Assay for qualitative detection of amphetamine in oral fluid using homogeneous enzyme immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative determination of amphetamine in human oral fluid at 150 ng/mL cutoff, collected exclusively with Oral-Eze Saliva Collection System, for clinical laboratory use only; provides preliminary results requiring confirmation by GC/MS or LC-MS/MS.
